2164.subject: HOSP
2164.descrlong:
Investigates  cost  control  principles  and  their  management   and  application  to  hospitality operation  costs,  including  exploration  of  food,  beverage, labor,  and  material cost  controls from   a   sustainable   and   strategic   perspective.   Active   problem    solving   and   practical applications, such as income statements  and balance sheets, are used. (Sections may be offered as classroom-based,  hybrid or online courses.)

[(Prereq: HOSP 482) and (Coreq: HOSP 483)]
